data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of San Salvador to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Salvador, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of San Salvador.
Jesus, help the local leaders in San Salvador, Bahamas to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 549 people in the state of San Salvador who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cockburn Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cockburn Town, San Salvador, Bahamas.
Jesus, please give the apostles in San Salvador, Bahamas a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in San Salvador, Bahamas that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of San Salvador to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
